ActionableOrchSourceEvent.name: ActionableOrchSourceEvent
ActionableOrchSourceEvent.description: Represents information about an event on which actions are taken by the orchestration process.

AdditionalCriteria.description: The additional criteria that customers want to share about an actionable event.

Category.description: The category of the actionable event.

EventData.description: The data about an actionable event, such as the faults, signals, or other input details.

EventUuid.description: A universal unique identifier (UUID) that identifies a platform event message. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ReplayId.description: Represents an ID value that is populated by the system and refers to the position of the event in the event stream. Replay ID values arenâ€™t guaranteed to be contiguous for consecutive events. A subscriber can store a replay ID value and use it on resubscription to retrieve missed events that are within the retention window.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of an event in the source system where the event originates.

Subtype.description: The subtype of the actionable event.

Type.description: The type of the actionable event.
